Quantile from weighted data

Source: R/dist-empirical.R
wt_quant.Rd

Quantile from weighted data

Arguments

p

the quantile probabilities

names

should the result be named

na.rm

remove NAs from observations (and weights)

x

the observations

w

importance weights. Must be some non zero weights, and all must be finite. They don't need to sum to one.

link

a link function mapping observations to infinite support

Developed by Robert Challen.

Site built with pkgdown 2.2.0.
